name: Pyke
subtitle: the Bloodharbor Ripper
description: A renowned harpooner from the slaughter docks of Bilgewater, Pyke should have met his death in the belly of a gigantic jaull-fish… and yet, he returned. Now, stalking the dank alleys and backways of his former hometown, he uses his new supernatural... See More

abilities.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
abilities.description: When Pyke is hidden from enemies, he regenerates damage that he has recently taken from champions. Pyke also cannot gain extra Maximum Health from any source, and instead gains Bonus AD.

abilities.name: Bone Skewer
abilities.description: Pyke either stabs an enemy in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.

abilities.name: Ghostwater Dive
abilities.description: Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant Move Speed that decays over time.

abilities.name: Phantom Undertow
abilities.description: Pyke dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemy champions along its path.
